annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are necessary — and good hygiene, sanitation, clean water, and nutrition are insufficient for stopping infectious diseases

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are necessary — and good hygiene, sanitation, clean water, and nutrition are insufficient for stopping infectious diseases

annotation.spannedText: If we don’t maintain optimum rates of immunization or “herd immunity”, the diseases prevented by vaccination will return

classMention.mentionClass: If we don’t maintain optimum rates of immunization or “herd immunity”, the diseases prevented by vaccination will return

annotation.spannedText: If people are not vaccinated, diseases that have become uncommon such as pertussis (whooping cough), polio and measles, will quickly reappear

classMention.mentionClass: If people are not vaccinated, diseases that have become uncommon such as pertussis (whooping cough), polio and measles, will quickly reappear

annotation.spannedText: Any licensed vaccine is rigorously tested across multiple phases of trials before it is approved for use, and regularly reassessed once it is on the market

classMention.mentionClass: Any licensed vaccine is rigorously tested across multiple phases of trials before it is approved for use, and regularly reassessed once it is on the market

annotation.spannedText: Scientists are also constantly monitoring information from several sources for any sign that a vaccine may cause an adverse event

classMention.mentionClass: Scientists are also constantly monitoring information from several sources for any sign that a vaccine may cause an adverse event

annotation.spannedText: Most vaccine reactions are usually minor and temporary, such as a sore arm or mild fever

classMention.mentionClass: Most vaccine reactions are usually minor and temporary, such as a sore arm or mild fever

annotation.spannedText: It is far more likely to be seriously injured by a vaccine-preventable disease than by a vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: It is far more likely to be seriously injured by a vaccine-preventable disease than by a vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Two key reasons to get vaccinated are to protect ourselves and to protect those around us

classMention.mentionClass: Two key reasons to get vaccinated are to protect ourselves and to protect those around us

annotation.spannedText: We should not rely on people around us to stop the spread of disease; we, too, must do what we can

classMention.mentionClass: We should not rely on people around us to stop the spread of disease; we, too, must do what we can

annotation.spannedText: A child is exposed to far more antigens from a common cold or sore throat than they are from vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: A child is exposed to far more antigens from a common cold or sore throat than they are from vaccines

annotation.spannedText: The key advantage of having several vaccines at once is fewer clinic visits, which saves time and money

classMention.mentionClass: The key advantage of having several vaccines at once is fewer clinic visits, which saves time and money

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinating pregnant women has the added benefit of protecting their newborns

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinating pregnant women has the added benefit of protecting their newborns

annotation.spannedText: It is the best way to reduce your chances of severe flu and of spreading it to others

classMention.mentionClass: It is the best way to reduce your chances of severe flu and of spreading it to others

annotation.spannedText: It is safe and the most widely-used preservative for vaccines that are provided in multi-dose vaccine vials

classMention.mentionClass: It is safe and the most widely-used preservative for vaccines that are provided in multi-dose vaccine vials

annotation.spannedText: There is no evidence to suggest that the amount of thiomersal used in vaccines poses a health risk

classMention.mentionClass: There is no evidence to suggest that the amount of thiomersal used in vaccines poses a health risk

annotation.spannedText: Unfortunately, its publication set off a panic that led to dropping immunization rates, and subsequent outbreaks of these diseases

classMention.mentionClass: Unfortunately, its publication set off a panic that led to dropping immunization rates, and subsequent outbreaks of these diseases

annotation.spannedText: There is no evidence of a link between MMR vaccine and autism or autistic disorders.

classMention.mentionClass: There is no evidence of a link between MMR vaccine and autism or autistic disorders.
